step_original: Particular provisions: Goods not concerned by Regulation (EC) No 834/2007 (organic products)
step_description: If your goods are not organic
xstep_description: Your trade may be exempt from this requirement if your good is not considered to be organic, in which case you must remove all reference to organic from the packaging.
xstep_howto_description: See for more information on exemptions.
step_howto_description: Ensure that all reference to organic is removed from the packaging.
